Very good. Going on 200 hours and I want to kill my family. Where is my wife?

Portal was a masterpiece and it looked like it was meant to be a standalone game. Despite that, I find Portal 2 an excellent (unexpected) sequel and even better game than its predecessor. This is a game which preserves all the great stuff from the first part (great puzzles, nostalgic environment, fluid game-play, one of the best humor in gaming) and it adds so much more, like: more game story and great backstory, very funny new character, new locations (my favorite is the huge underground cave-facility, very cool atmosphere), more puzzle solving during exploration (in addition to standard chamber puzzles), new and more diverse puzzle related objects/concepts/constructions. It also has a MULTIPLAYER mode (split-screen or online) which is very enjoyable.

Another masterpiece and I recommend it to everyone.

The story is great, I personally like this game more over than the 1st, but that's just me. The game's mechanics are polished af, the atmosphere & feel of the game is awesome. I enjoy the dialogue between characters, especially during scenes that involve Wheatly, as I personally love his way of handling situation and his personality. The game also has a neat collection of community maps. The only thing I don't like the game is a specific section, but that's just me. Great puzzles, great story, great characters, great game.

puzzles incríveis que te fazem raciocinar e um bom cooperativo.
Great puzzle game, a lot of fun and taking a lot of creativity and thinking to get.

[h1] O que dizer sobre este jogo? [/h1]

Portal 2 é um jogo de puzzles que acompanha a história do seu primeiro jogo, nele para concluir os puzzles você precisa usar da mecânica da sua portal gun que consiste em basicamente um portal no qual você entra e o outro que é por onde você sai, durante o jogo diversos novos objetos ou até inimigos iram aparecer para dificultar os desafios (como as caixas/bolas, turrets, etc). Com 9 capítulos no total o jogo além de conseguir fazer você pensar muito para concluir esses puzzles também consegue criar uma otima história.

[h1] Co-op [/h1]

O jogo além do seu modo Singleplayer também possui um modo cooperativo, diferente do modo singleplayer ele não possui uma história ou sentindo que envolva no desenvolvimento do enredo, consiste em dois robos que foram criados pela GlaDOs com o propósito de concluir os desafios criados pela mesma, o modo é bem divertido e ao mesmo tempo consegue criar a tal dificuldade presente no seu modo singleplayer, usa das mesmas mecânicas apresentadas no seu modo solo.

[h1] Recomendo? [/h1] 

Sim recomendo demais esse jogo! Como dito anteriormente o jogo possui sua dificuldade mas nada impossivel, eu mesmo não sou um cara de puzzles mas esse jogo me ganhou, a história é incrivel e o modo cooperativo extremamente divertido, então se você está procurando um jogo completamente diferente de tudo que já viu e com um certo grau de dificuldade você achou o jogo certo!

good puzzle game great coop mechanics

Portal 2 is, quite simply, a masterpiece. To anyone who is on the fence, I would say it is 100% worth a buy. Not only is the story entertaining, it is also funny, perfectly paced, and damn challenging at times. Not to mention the co-op mode that offers plenty of more hours of play (and plenty more friendships destroyed).

TL;DR: Good game. Get.

What can I say? It's been cvlose to 10 years since this game was released & I still love it just as much as the first day I played it. If it's not enough that the game is action-packed & so much fun to play through the campaign, then you can rest assured you'll get unlimited hours out of the stellar community maps.

And if even all that isn't enough for you, grab a friend to (voluntarily or involuntarily) join you in the mind-bending & blast-having-inducing 2-player co-op campaign. THis is truly one of the best buys you can make in all of gaming, past or present.

I haven't had a computer that can run the program very well for a couple years, so I'm revisiting the game now with a better PC. I absolutely cannot wait to get back into the swing of lobbing portals everywhere & feeling smart for figuring out the awesome puzzles made by both Valve developers & community creators.

If you've never played any Portal games, I'd recommend starting with the first game, although it's not really necessary. I would recommend playing all iterations at some point, the sooner the better, though. Additions like Aperture Tag are basically just as awesome as the Valve-produced games.

Do yourself a favor & play all games Portal.
